Digital LAMP on a track-etched polycarbonate membrane can quantify DNA fragments at 10 copies/μL.
71 qLAMP with bisintercalating DNA redox reporters amplifies DNA in 10 min.
72 Fractal LAMP automatically detects label-free DNA in subnanoliter droplets.
73 “LAMP-seq” combines RT-LAMP with next-generation sequencing for large-scale COVID-19 diagnostics.
74 LAMP and a graphene-based screen-printed electrochemical sensor can lead to on-site detection of the pathogen’s nucleic acid.
75 The LAMP-based ID NOW system automatically returns the result in 13 min, which has a LoD of 125 copies/mL for SARS-CoV-2 detection, and has been approved by the US FDA for emergency use. The droplet microfluidic LAMP is high throughput for viral RNA detection.
76 The use of eosin photopolymerization for the detection of colorimetric LAMP products reduces false-positive risk.
